doc.field: C.J. LAWRENCE HAS BUY ON BETHLEHEM STEEL BS>

Aldo Mazzaferro, analyst at C.J. Lawrence Inc, issued an agressive buy opinion on Bethlehem Steel Corp, traders said. Bethlehem rose 7/8 to 10-3/4, the first time in several months the stock has been over 10 dlrs. Mazzaferro was not immediately available for comment. Reuter
